blogPost.excerpt: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.
blogPost.body: Lizard is an online guessing and trick-winning card game for up to 6 players. Your goal is to pick a number and win exactly as many times as you said you would. Not more, not less. Use special cards and rules to ruin your opponents.
blogPost.title: Lizard - Online card game for up to 6 players
blogPost.author: Murat Kemaldar

localize.description: 蜥蜴》是一款最多可以容纳6名玩家的在线猜谜赢牌游戏。你的目标是选择一个数字，并赢得完全与你说的次数一样。不能多，也不能少。使用特殊的卡片和规则来毁掉你的对手。
localize.tagline: 在线纸牌游戏，最多可容纳6名玩家

localize.description: 蜥蜴》是一款最多可以容納6名玩家的在線猜謎贏牌遊戲。你的目標是選擇一個數字，並贏得完全與你說的次數一樣。不能多，也不能少。使用特殊的卡片和規則來毀掉你的對手。
localize.tagline: 在線紙牌遊戲，最多可容納6名玩家

previous.excerpt: ABBYY FineScanner AI is the best in class scanning app that turns your mobile device into a productivity tool to quickly capture documents and books, create digital copies in PDF and DOCX, and recognize text on scans for further editing and sharing.
previous.title: ABBYY FineScanner AI 8 - Smart scanner app to make your remote work easy

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同类扫描应用中的佼佼者，它能将您的移动设备变成生产力工具，快速捕捉文档和书籍，创建PDF和DOCX格式的数字副本，并识别扫描件上的文本，以便进一步编辑和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能扫描仪应用，让你的远程工作更轻松

localize.description: ABBYY FineScanner AI是同類掃描應用中的佼佼者，它能將您的移動設備變成生產力工具，快速捕捉文檔和書籍，創建PDF和DOCX格式的數字副本，並識別掃描件上的文本，以便進一步編輯和分享。
localize.tagline: 智能掃描儀應用，讓你的遠程工作更輕鬆

next.title: PeachPay - Convert your passion into income
